import React,{useState} from "react" import ApiLogin from "../Api/apiLogin"; const ReqLogin = (props) => { const[data,setData]=useState({ username:'imelda', password:'password' }) const onSignIn=async () =>{ await ApiLogin.login(data.username, data.password) .then(result=> { alert(JSON.stringify(result)) // localStorage.setItem(config.LS.USERDATA, JSON.stringify(result.message.userdata)) // localStorage.setItem(config.LS.TOKEN, result.message.token) // this.props.history.push('/home') }).catch(err=>{ alert(JSON.stringify(err)) }) } return (
